function EP02_19()
    --.転-1【6月第1週】「晒された戦姫」
    SaveData.Title = "晒された戦姫"


    --//BG：1F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    MSG([[ Three days after the physical fitness test. A shocking incident occurred that rocked Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    --//CI：トランクスを穿いたエリカの写真が貼られた掲示板 035
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI035a")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Photos of me changing clothes were posted all over the school's bulletin boards. ]])

    MSG([[ And to make matters worse, there was a photo clearly showing my trunks under my skirt... ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0155.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Please move! I'm coming through!" ]])

    --//SE：破る音
PLAY_SE("SEc040.wav")
--WAIT(300)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Erika Onee-sama! With this, we should have disposed of all the photos on the first floor!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0353.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Thank you very much, Hiyu-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ With the help of the ‘Knights’, we somehow managed to dispose of all the photos before classes started, but the problem wasn’t solved at all. ]])

    MSG([[ We don’t know who the culprit is, and that person must have the original data of the photos, so they can spread them again and again. ]])

    MSG([[ Besides, in the brief time this morning, the way people looked at me completely changed— ]])
    --//BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0072.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "That’s Ikusa from first-year, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "To think she wears men’s underwear under such a pretty face." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "You just can’t judge people by appearances. I was completely deceived." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Seniors gossiping loudly enough for me to hear. ]])

    MSG([[ The cheers and admiring looks that greeted me until yesterday were completely replaced by mockery, contempt, and slander. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s not that I can’t handle being made fun of—I’ve been used to that for a long time. ]])

    MSG([[ But when the words people say about you change this quickly, even I can’t help but feel sad. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0354.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (People’s judgments... fall apart so suddenly.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0355.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (If I don’t do something before the rumors that I might be a boy spread, this is really bad. I have to do something...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：ヒユ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Onee-sama?" ]])

    MSG([[ When I looked up, Hiyu-san was peering at me with a worried expression. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0356.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-what? I-I’m sorry... I was just lost in thought." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0158.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Given the situation, it’s only natural to be anxious! We want you to fully rely on us ‘Knights’!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0159.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I investigated those photos, and it seems they were secretly taken through a gap in the entrance during our first PE changing time." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0160.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "So please rest assured that we Knights, who were changing together in the classroom, are innocent." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0357.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Don’t you all... feel disappointed in me?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0358.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Even though it's true that I was wearing strange underwear." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0161.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "What are you saying, Erika Onee-sama!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san puffed out her chest as if it were obvious. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0162.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "It’s common to create gap moe by combining a beautiful girl with masculine fashion like loincloths or gakuran coats!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0163.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "We Knights might get excited by the fact that such an elegant beauty like Erika Onee-sama wore trunks, but we would never be disappointed." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0359.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hiyu-san..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san’s unexpectedly positive interpretation, which I usually feel self-conscious about, is very encouraging right now. ]])

    MSG([[ They always think of me as the most beautiful girl first and foremost. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ma")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0164.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Besides, Erika Onee-sama lives with her cousin Minato-san, right? So it’s natural to think you accidentally wore them." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01mb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0165.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Imagining such a natural Erika Onee-sama... it only makes me more excited!!! Hyuaaaa!!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0360.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-yes, that's true. I used to imitate boys and wear trunks... so even now, I sometimes put them on by mistake." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I decided to ride on Hiyu-san’s unexpectedly kind interpretation. ]])

    MSG([[ For Hiyu-san and the others, this interpretation is probably far more realistic than thinking I might actually be a boy. ]])

    MSG([[ For now, I’ll explain the situation to the Knights during homeroom this morning. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0361.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (The problem is, what do I do after this?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0166.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "I’ll ask my friends from the Detective Research Club to start investigating the voyeur...! Well, I suppose they’re acting on Hoozuki-san’s orders anyway!" ]])

    PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
    --//BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//SE：走る音
PLAY_SE("SEa015.wav")
--WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ Hiyu-san said that and hurried away. ]])

    MSG([[ I see. I’d completely forgotten, but these photos are clearly sabotage against the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ If that’s the case, it might be reasonable to assume the culprit is part of Lira-san’s faction. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    --//BG：体育館
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG018aa")
    --//BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR04ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035" , 1000,false)

    --//effect：セピア（回想）

    MSG([[ What comes to mind is the dispute during the recent physical fitness test. If that caused resentment, it would make sense for Lira-san to give orders to the Knights... right—? ]])

    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)
    --//BG：1Ｆ廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0362.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "No, that’s definitely not it. Lira-san isn’t that kind of person!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I shook off the unpleasant thought that had come to mind. I know how stoic and sincere Lira-san is about the title of ‘Princess.’ ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t imagine her personality allowing such a despicable sabotage. ]])

    --//BU：リラ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "E-Erika." ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, Lira-san happened to pass by and our eyes met. ]])

    --//BU：リラ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    MSG([[ Lira-san’s expression twisted sadly, and she turned her back to me as if to flee. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Huh. ]])

    MSG([[ What does this mean? ]])

    MSG([[ What was that reaction all about— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0363.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Lira-san!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ But Lira-san neither stopped nor looked back. ]])

    MSG([[ Should I search for the culprit? Should I run about trying to clear up the bad rumors? ]])

    MSG([[ Without a clear vision, I stood alone in the hallway, lost in thought. ]])
    --　　　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_20")
end
